column4: Any idea about how to fix update manager issue. Please check this link http://goo.gl/cR08E for details and the error while update is here http://pastebin.com/BnpgmUnD
should i edit gksu gedit /etc/apt/sources.list edbian:
You did or someone else. At least acording to the screenshot
That file is PPA free, so there muist be a file inm /etc/apt/sources.list.d
can reset your system with ppa-purge. That will uninstall the repository and set every package to the one from the origin rep
you can try to fix it with ppa-purge ppa:exaile-devel-ppa-natty
Okay then the hard way. just sudo mv exaile-devel-ppa-natty.list exaile-devel-ppa-natty.list.old
You can still run into problems with packages that are still installed from that repo
But that can normally be solved by uninstalling these packages when it happens
